ModMetaData.name: Reverse Engineered Mechanoid Shields
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: With all the mechanoid clusters that have been landing on the rimworlds as of late, it was only a matter of time before some bright spark conceived a way to use their technology for the betterment of colonists everywhere. With the right technology, colonists can now build their own mortar and bullet shields - which do the same job as their mechanoid counterparts - to help defend themselves against all but the most determined of attackers.
